DOC.detailed_description: The investigator invite individual hypogonadism require pubertal induction participate study . The participant receive conventional routine oestrogen replacement form transdermal patch . The participant review every 2 month total 8 month document uterine , breast bone assessment . DOC.criteria: 1 . Have diagnosis hypogonadism ( Turner 's syndrome , hypogonadotrophic hypogonadism , primary ovarian insufficiency , hypopituitarism , hypothalamic amenorrhoea , transgender ) 2 . ≥ 10 year age 3 . Oestrogen naïve i.e . prior commencement oestrogen treatment 4 . Breast Tanner stage ≤ 2 1 . Previous oncology treatment 2 . Primary amenorrhoea secondary chronic medical comorbidity 3 . PCOS diagnosis
